changes: Fixed issue when showing types login credentials when a error on login accused

Fixed issue with default version when an invalid changelog version is provided.
Added loading spinner to the production line page when loading.
Improved user feedback for error messages.

Added brute force attack protection. After 5 failed login attempts, the account will be locked for 1 hour. because FICSIT’s got safety regulations even for your fingers. Remember: real engineers don’t forget their passwords!
Improved the visualisation of the production line.
Added visualisation of the production line. (This is in early development expect bugs and missing features.) To use this feature press CTRL + V on the production line page.

Disabled the save and power buttons when loading the data.

Fixed a bug in calculating the imports.

Completely overhauled the automatic calculations for better performance.
Significantly improved calculation speed and efficiency.
Enhanced calculation accuracy and reliability.
Reduced the likelihood of calculation errors and overrides.
Fixed issues where calculations would overwrite user inputs.
Removed the auto-save option, as it is no longer necessary.

Made production line globally for production line and not based on user.

improved the maintenance page.
